description: Maps configuration integrity failure criticality levels (L1-L5) defined in chr_schema to mandated system enforcement actions (L-9 Procedures).

L1_INFORMATIONAL.mandate: Log non-critical checksum warnings for review.

L3_MODULE_HIGH.mandate: Restart affected subsystem in restricted sandbox mode.

L4_SYSTEM_HIGH.mandate: Immediate full system halt, save diagnostic core dump, await manual review.

L5_CORE_CRITICAL.mandate: Initiate irreversible operational lock, self-terminate execution, erase volatile memory banks (required for self-integrity failure or critical protocol breaches).
